answers.answer: What has your doctor said ? I've 26 weeks and I've gained 20 pounds.
What has your doctor said ? Im 26 weeks and I've gained 20 pounds, I'm also very tall and slim before I got pregnant. My doctor said my weight is normal. i would talk to your doctor.
Well that's a lot for a single baby but everyone is different.I knew a skinny girl that gained 100 pounds all 4 times she was pregnant with a single baby. It's unusual but everybody is different.
Have you been tested to diabetes? Being 200 pounds and gaining 60 and your only 21 weeks could be bad for the baby. I would talk to your doctor

question: I'm 21 weeks pregented I've fainted 60 pounds is that bad or good I weight 200 pounds
title: i have a queston
